subject: Use of @Before?
msgSnippet: Hi I am hoping someone can help me understand the use of @Before. As far as I know when JUnit runs tests a new instance is created for each testcase. So why
messageBody:
Hi

I am hoping someone can help me understand the use of @Before. As far
as I know when JUnit runs tests a new instance is created for each
testcase.

So why not initialise your test variables where you define them in the
class or in the constructor. I can see no need for @Before.

Thanks

Ride
